name: Egg Nest - White on Gold - Women
description:
It doesn't get much more down home than a happy shirt with chicken eggs. We don't put our brand name anywhere on the shirt so all folks see is a snappy looking egg nest on a field of color. 

This gold shirt is super saturated with color.  It radiates like the sun itself.  Sometimes yellows can seem a bit weak but this gold has epic powers.  Think farmer sunshine bling kinda gold.

name: Microgreen - Kid's Chartreuse on Indigo
description:
Let the kids enjoy making fun with nature too. This ultra-soft tri-blend shirt is incredibly huggable. If the shirt is for your own kids, they will bring a smile to every room they enter. If this is a gift, you can feel pretty safe that this will be a welcome present because it has a positive theme and is made with their child's comfort and safety in mind. Much better than buying them foreign-made plastic or dust collectors.

The chartreuse color really pops against the American Apparel indigo colored shirt. The tri-blend shirts use three tones of indigo thread which tend to help hide drips and stains. We used environmentally friendly plastisol ink on these kids shirts so they can stand up to more washes than the water based ink.

Children's size 6 years only for now.  We have an infant size too elsewhere in the catalog.

name: The Waltons - White on Poppy - Women
description: This shirt works on so many levels. We love The Waltons and so much of what my generation in the city learned about homesteading was through their family's stories. I know many more families than mine enjoyed offering "Goodnight John-boy" through the house at bedtime and giggling. This shirt reminds us of those good times. Also though, this is dance culture gold. This shirt riffs on the classic Experimental Jetset shirt from 2001. If you are a dance culture person who straddles into being new rural too, this is for you.

name: Farmgirl - White on Grass - Women
description:
When I told my neighbor about Shangobrand, she said I should make a shirt that said "farmgirl" because that is what she calls her wife.  I made the shirt with the same girlie lightheartedness that she has.  The simple design with no branding on the shirt has been a quick winner with the ladies.  Maybe for you too.

I chose two different color vibes depending on when you think you might wear it.  The grass green is obviously the springier one and is especially great for going out in and generally feeling upbeat and chipper.  Sometimes though you actually gotta dress for the garden and darker colors are called for.  That is why I printed the other shirt too.  American Apparel calls the color "lieutenant" which doesn't really tell us anything.  They are playing on drab though and this color is a rather serene and somehow classy looking olive.  The font is flesh tone.  It will look fabulous with strawberry juice stains on it.

What you see here is the white on grass color.

name: Easy Tote Firewood Carrier
description:
Hand built by a craftsman on Vashon Island, these firewood totes are the right tool for the job.  Made with heavy canvas, hearty stitching and wood dowels, this carrier is plenty burly to carry what you need to move.  We stand by the idea that a simple, well-built tool is the right tool.  There may be fancier firewood carriers but you will not find a more effective one.

Buy one for the homestead, the cabin and your neighbor's homestead too!

Due to its length, shipping on this item is $14 alone and only $8.00 with other items.

name: Farm Chores Saved My Life - Yellow on Lapis Blue - Women
description:
This idea was the seed of Shangobrand and became our first shirt.  Its clear and humble message feels good.  The font is distilled from classic western and rural movie posters so it evokes alot of dusty integrity along with the actual message.

The lemon zest yellow plastisol ink is environmentally friendly and does a really good job retaining its color.

categories.name: Farm Chores Saved My Life T-Shirt

name: Raw Local Honey
description:
This honey is produced here on Vashon Island in hives without pesticides.  We don't heat it at all and only filter out any hive debris.  You cannot buy a more pure honey.  

We hear time and time again from folks that this is the best honey they have tasted.  We believe good honey can come from anywhere but the important part is that it is raw and unrefined.  Most honey isn't really even honey anymore.  Buy real honey from real beekeepers.

One 8 ounce jar of raw honey

name: Vegan Farmer - Lemon on Evergreen - Women
description:
I meet more and more vegan farmers every day. If you are the kind of vegan who likes to engage with folks, here is a subtle way to let folks know you prefer eating plants.  I chose a happy, environmentally friendly, water-based yellow ink.  Water based inks have a washed out look to them for a rustic vibe.

The women's tri-blend shirt has a bit of scoop to the neck and is not the usual crew neck. The tri-blend shirt is incredibly soft and stays that way.  The three shades of green thread also help hide drips and stains really well for when you drop tahini on it.

name: Kombucha  - Tea on Navy - Women
description:
Kombucha is really making a resurgence and folks everywhere are developing their own recipes and brews.  We champion the power of the "mother" to help heal our digestive system and perk us up in the morning.  Celebrate the bubbly goodness with this snazzy shirt with kombucha being brewed to the side.  Let folks know, "Hey!  I brew kombucha too!"

The women's shirt is on a deep navy colored shirt so you can match it with any other style you have going on.  Great with jeans or atop that happy skirt you have.

This shirt makes a great gift too.  So often "kombucha people" are hard to buy for and this is something you'll be sure is unique.

Love your mother.

name: Microgreen - Infant - Chartreuse on Indigo
description:
Infant clothes look uber-cute most of the time simply because they are tiny.  Pile on the cute with this punny reference to microgreens on your little sprout of a kid.  This ultra-soft tri-blend shirt is incredibly huggable.  Because the shirt is tri-blend instead of all cotton, it stays soft even after accidentally getting cooked in the dryer.  If this is a gift, you can feel pretty safe that this will be a welcome present because it has a positive theme and is made with their child's comfort and safety in mind.  Much better than buying them foreign-made plastic or dust collectors.

The chartreuse color really pops against the American Apparel tri-indigo colored shirt. The tri-blend shirts use three tones of indigo thread which tend to help hide drips and stains.  We used environmentally friendly plastisol ink on these kids shirts so they can stand up to more washes than the water based ink.  The ink is non-toxic and chewing approved.

Children's size 6-12 months only for now.  We have a 6 year size too elsewhere in the catalog.

name: The Waltons - White on Olive - Women
description: This shirt works on so many levels. We love The Waltons and so much of what my generation in the city learned about homesteading was through their family's stories. I know many more families than mine enjoyed offering "Goodnight John-boy" through the house at bedtime and giggling. This shirt reminds us of those good times. Also though, this is dance culture gold. This shirt riffs on the classic Experimental Jetset shirt from 2001. If you are a dance culture person who straddles into being new rural too, this is for you.

name: Egg Nest - White on Sangria - Women
description:
It doesn't get much more down home than a happy shirt with chicken eggs. We don't put our brand name anywhere on the shirt so all folks see is a snappy looking egg nest on a field of color.  

The sangria color is exceptional.  It is a bright shade of magenta that looks as if it is electrified.

name: Egg Nest - White on Camel - Men
description:
A homesteading man understands the value of eggs, caring for the ladies and the importance of a loud cock in the yard to keep folks safe.  Our "egg nest" shirt is minimal and keeps the message simple.  

We chose this elegant white on camel design to be masculine while still rocking ovum on your chest.

"Not like the crack that you put in a pipe
But crack on your forehead, here's a towel, now wipe "
-"Egg Man" by Beastie Boys.

I know that not everybody likes the brighter colors.  If you are actually on the farm then an olive shirt is a way better idea than sunshine yellow.  This one is for the folks who play in the dirt.
